channel.title: Portforwarding.. :(
channel.description:
Portforwarding with utorrent.
[b]FFS IRL[/b]
says.. ;port 43594 is already in use; when i runserver..
Hmmph, me donts gots a cloo.
your help will be aprriciated <3 :)

item.title: Portforwarding.. :(
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

OK first, utorrent?
ok i had this problem (port forwarding)
Download hamachi make YOUR OWN server thing
Then people can just connect to your hamachi server IP
just open up runserver.bat and then open your best client for hamachi (silab)
your done!

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding.. :(
item.dc:creator: @stuntscape stuntscape
item.description:
@stuntscape wrote:

ok mine did that all you need to do is open your utorrent the chage port to (5555) then hit ok the run your server (run.bat) then go back into utorent and then put the port back to (43594) then apply then hit ok then hit cross and then close your run.bat then compile then open back up run.bat and then you are done…

                hope i help if stuck on anything els just email me on heere cya :D

Read full topic

item.description:

dude, put the uttorent on first the runserver.bat it will work, ;D
